actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to extend the appropriation authorization for the Commercial Fisheries Research and Development Act of 1964, as amended.

summary.text: Amends the Commercial Fisheries Research and Development Act of 1964 to extend the authorization of appropriations through fiscal year 1983 to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to extend the appropriation authorization for the Commercial Fisheries Research and Development Act of 1964, as amended.
